sentence.Network_en: The unrighteous penny corrupts the righteous pound.

sentence.Network_en: But all of the sacred writings say that you will devour the wicked and the unrighteous.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是所有神圣的纪录都说你们要吞掉脆弱和邪恶的.

sentence.Network_en: And the Lord said, Hear what the unrighteous judge says.
sentence.Network_cn: 主说: [你们听这不义之官所说的话.
